overview: Mr. Yogerst gets a little personal in this lecture on California's Anza-Borrego Desert State Park, which he's been going to his entire life. Explore the melted landscape of the Borrego Badlands, the sandy trails of Coyote Canyon, the majesty of the Salton Sea, and the natural springs of the Vallecito Valley.
title: California’s Badlands: Anza-Borrego
